Description: Verifies that the consonants are replaced with the appropriate digits.
Ensures that the sole letter of a one-letter word is retained and padded with zeros.
Checks if the result is padded with zeros to ensure a total of 4 characters.
Validates that duplicate consonant encodings, separated by vowels, are combined.
Ensures that the first letter is uppercased in the result.
Confirms that the consonants are encoded correctly, ignoring case differences.
